moreBlocks.classesAndSeminars: Children and Forever Parenting Seminar, Portage County Domestic Relations Court, 2006 - 2014

description:
Whether going through a divorce or facing a criminal charge, people in need of help can turn to Rosenberg & Associates in Ravenna, Ohio, for effective legal representation. From the moment our team meets with a client during a free initial consultation, we strategize ways to resolve the case in the most efficient manner possible. Our law office handles a range of civil and criminal issues, including the following:

  • Family law: Custody, divorce and post-decree matters
  • Criminal defense: Felonies, misdemeanors and traffic violations
  • Personal injury: Dog bites, wrongful death and motor vehicle accidents
  • Probate and civil litigation

The attorneys at our law office have decades of combined experience in courtrooms, appeals and negotiations. By and large, many of the cases we take do not reach litigation and instead are brought to a close through settlement strategies. We understand that going through the process quickly is important to our clients, who are ready to move forward with their lives. At the same time, we are thorough in our approach, ensuring we have not only reached our goals but we have set up our clients for a brighter future.

Our law office is conveniently located in Ravenna, Ohio. We assist clients in Portage County and other surrounding counties including Stark, Summit, and Trumbull Counties. We take every measure we can to accommodate our clients, responding to their concerns promptly and honestly. At Rosenberg & Associates, we accept credit cards.
